title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and resist dyed on plain weave and quilted (chintz)
description: On dark cream ground, predominantly blue and red pattern of exotic flower heads and twining branches.  Field has central medallion and decoration in each corner, is separated from wide floral border by two narrow decorated strips.  Quilted and backed with coarse olive green and white cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and resist dyed on plain weave and quilted (chintz). Gift of Mrs. Cole Younger. 1959-109-3.
